text: Tapa'i bhannus ki ke hamile allaha baheka, yasto kurala'i guharaum jasale na hamila'i pha'ida garna sakdacha na ta noksana. Ra jaba allahale hamila'i sahibato dekha'isakeko cha, ta ke hami tyasabata vimukha bha'ihalaum? Tyo manisa jasto jasala'i ki saitanaharu jangalama sahi margabata vicalita garidi'eka chan usale yata'uta ghumdai garcha, usakakehi sathiharu pani chan ra uniharu thikabatotira bola'umchan ki hamro pasama a'ihala. Bhanidinus ki sahibato ta tyahi nai ho juna hamila'i allahale dekha'eko cha ra hamila'i ta yahi adesa prapta bha'eko cha ki hami aphno palanakartako purnarupale ajnakari banaum
